name: Kingdra
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

attacks.name: Brine
attacks.effect: This attack does 90 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tornado Shot
attacks.effect: Discard a {W} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
